metadata.name: "I Think We Should Break Up."
metadata.description:
The beauty of New York City and its people inspired me to pick up a camera. There are infinite moments worth freezing in time here, they just need to be found and captured.

This is my genesis photograph, a moment about heartbreak.

You two sit down again after another loveless date. You can tell by their body language and tone that something isn't right. Then those three words come. "We should talk."

You suddenly realize how close you are to the last chapter of your book together. You think back and things still haven't changed. The fights still happen, the spark still hasn't returned.

The love has dried, and the cracks show. Now all the gold in the world can’t fix it. No Kintsugi, just broken pieces of something that was once whole and beautiful.

Was it you? Was there something that you could have done earlier? Maybe, but it’s too late now. The only thing left are the memories, until they fade too.

Strangers, once again.

This is the first in a series of photos capturing candid moments through a 50mm lens.

---

11:11 pm, 10/3/2022  
Gramercy, Manhattan  
New York City

Canon EOS M50m2  
50mm f/1.8 STM  
2240 x 3360

Edition: 1/1
